comment.author: 23224989@N07
comment._content:
Title: When "carneys" were clean.
From up here I can see half way up the mountain!

comment.author: 18998931@N07
comment._content:
Look at those Colorado ski slopes!

This photograph is so beautiful because of all the color. Even though it was a cloudy day and it looks like it's about to rain, the photographer managed to capture such a great photograph.

comment.author: 77587428@N06
comment._content: When a kid I ran away from home because of my wicked stepmom and was given sanctuary with a carnival sideshow.  I traveled with them all summer and they were the best family I ever had.  However, the carny boss put pressure on me to contact my Dad about a week before school started.  Dad was told the skivvy and life was way better once I got home.  I cried because I did not want to go home.  That is how great these folks were.  It was probably, the best summer of my life.
